main event: On April 15, 1952, WY H. Platt reported observing an unidentified flying object near Albuquerque, New Mexico. The object was described as elliptical, yellow to white in color, and estimated to be 25-30 feet in diameter. It moved erratically, oscillating and bobbing up and down.
interesting points: The object changed colors rapidly from yellow to white before disappearing., The witness described the object's erratic motion as oscillating up and down., The sighting occurred during a clear evening in Albuquerque., No sound was reported during the observation, indicating the object was silent., There were no known aircraft in the airspace at the time of the sighting.
witness description: W.Y. Platt, a resident observing the object in the sky.
